Service.Name: OData.org
Service.Description: A service that exposes information from OData.org - like Producers and Consumers - as OData

Service.Name: Netflix
Service.Description: The complete netflix on-demand media catalog

Service.Name: ebay
Service.Description: ebay online auction and shopping catalog

Service.Name: twitpic
Service.Description: twitpic now exposes its Images, Users, Comments etc via OData

Service.Name: Devexpress Channel
Service.Description: Devexpress has lots of training videos, now available via an OData feed

Service.Name: DBpedia
Service.Description: A community effort to extract structured information from Wikipedia and to make this information available on the Web, with full support for OData interactions on the live query services

Service.Name: NuGet
Service.Description: Visual Studio extension that makes it easy to install and update open source libraries and tools in Visual Studio

Service.Name: nerddinner
Service.Description: A website that helps nerds to meet and talk, not surprisingly it has adopted OData

Service.Name: Northwind Service
Service.Description: This service exposes the famous Northwind sample database in read-only mode via OData
